title: Full-Stack Development
description: End-to-end web application development using React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, C#, and .NET. Building scalable, maintainable, and high-performance solutions.

title: AI/ML Solutions
description: Intelligent systems powered by machine learning and artificial intelligence. From data analysis to predictive models and automation.

title: SaaS Platform Development
description: Complete SaaS solutions from concept to deployment. Multi-tenant architecture, subscription management, and scalable infrastructure.

title: Trading & Fintech Systems
description: Real-time trading platforms, financial analytics, and secure payment systems. Built for performance, reliability, and compliance.

title: Cloud Solutions & DevOps
description: Cloud infrastructure setup, containerization with Docker, CI/CD pipelines, and automated deployment on AWS, Azure, and GCP.

title: UI/UX Design & Branding
description: Crafting intuitive user interfaces and compelling brand identities. User-centric design that drives engagement and conversion.
